details:
netfilter: nf_tables: fix scheduling-while-atomic splat

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit f4fbfbccc0a957b78768f1925f28df81185d395e, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 81ea010667417ef3f218dfd99b69769fe66c2b67. For more details please see the references link.
